title: What is Svelte kit
description: Svelte Kit is a powerful framework for building webapplications with exceptional efficiency. It combinesthe best features of Svelte, a popular JavaScriptframework known for its lightweight and reactive approach, with a comprehensive toolkit for streamlineddevelopment
